projects.name: Canvas Based Website
projects.description: Used Property of Canvas with library of gsap made a website with unique look and innovative design.

projects.name: IOT Based Home Automation
projects.description: Utilizing Node MCU ESP8266, a single Relay Module, and the Arduino IDE, we developed a system responsive to Google assistant commands and controllable through the Blynk App. Controlling Home devices such as lights through google assistant.

projects.name: MYCanteen app for a startup
projects.description: Designed two applications catering to both user and seller using Figma and through Uiux designing. Designed for canteens, users can order hassle free and canteens can maintain their transaction and inventory.

experiences.description: Proficient in Figma, Designing App and Website with user centric design which helps in better user Experience. Worked Closely with the front-end team and helped them in coding and collaborating for fast better work flow.
Completed a 7-day bootcamp on hands on project learning practical concept about HTML CSS and JavaScript. After Completing the bootcamp made my own project of a golf website.

Developed Proficiency in threat analysis, vulnerability assessments and security protocols. Got to know more about Penetration testing and incident response plan, Strengthening my Cybersecurity practices.
